info.title: Endpoints
info.description: Invoices Public API to call Tipalti Services (Build Version:  2024-02-08-952396)

get.description:
Retrieves a list of GL accounts according to specific search/filtering criteria. If a filter is not specified, the API response will include all GL accounts.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.gl-account.read

schema.description: The filter query string. See Filtering for query specifications. Available filterable parameters are described below.
The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

get.description:
Retrieves information about a specific GL account by using its given ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.gl-account.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the GL account in Tipalti.

post.description:
Initiates an asynchronous process for creating a batch of invoices.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.invoice-batch.write

get.summary: Get invoice batch upload summary by ID
get.description:
Returns the processing status of the entire batch and the processing statuses of each invoice within the batch.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.invoice-batch.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the invoice batch in Tipalti.

schema.description: The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

get.description:
Retrieves a list of invoices according to pre-defined search/filtering criteria. If a filter is not specified, the API response will include all invoices.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.invoice.read

schema.description: The filter query string. See Filtering for query specifications. Available filterable parameters are described below.
The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

items.subject: Beverages for company meeting
items.description: Food and beverages for the new year toast

get.description:
Retrieves information about a specific invoice by using its given ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.invoice.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the invoice in Tipalti.

value.subject: Beverages for company meeting
value.description: Food and beverages for the new year toast

get.description:
Retrieves a list of invoice lines by using the invoice's given ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.invoice.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the invoice in Tipalti.

schema.description: The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

get.description:
Retrieves information about a specific invoice line by using its given invoice line ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.invoice.read

schema.description: The unique identifier of the invoice line in Tipalti.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the invoice in Tipalti.

get.description:
Retrieves a list of tax codes according to a specific search/filtering criteria. If a filter is not specified, the API response will include all tax codes.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.tax-code.read

schema.description: The filter query string. See Filtering for query specifications. Available filterable parameters are described below.
The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

get.description:
Retrieves information about a specific tax code by using its given ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.tax-code.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tax code in Tipalti.

get.description:
The get list of custom fields action retrieves a list of custom fields according to specific search/ filtering criteria. If a filter is not specified, the API response will include all custom fields.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.custom-field.read

schema.description: The filter query string. See Filtering for query specifications. Available filterable parameters are described below.
The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

get.description:
The get custom field by ID action retrieves information about a specific custom field by using its given ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.custom-field.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the custom field in Tipalti.

get.description:
The get list of custom field value options action retrieves a list of custom field value options according to specific search/ filtering criteria. If a filter is not specified, the API response will include all custom field value options for the given custom field.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.custom-field.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the custom field in Tipalti.

schema.description: The filter query string. See Filtering for query specifications. Available filterable parameters are described below.
The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

get.description:
The get custom field value option by ID action retrieves information about a specific custom field value option by using its given ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.custom-field.read

schema.description: The unique identifier of the custom field value option in Tipalti.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the custom field in Tipalti.

get.description:
The Get List of Payees action retrieves a list of payees according to specific search/ filtering criteria. If a filter is not specified, the API response will include all payees.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payee.read

schema.description: The filter query string. See Filtering for query specifications. Available filterable parameters are described below.
The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

post.description:
The Create Payee action creates a new payee using the provided request body data, and returns the newly created payee information.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payee.write

get.description:
The Get Payee by ID action retrieves information about a specific payee by using its given ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payee.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payee in Tipalti.

patch.description:
Updates a specific payee based on the data provided in the request body, and returns the updated payee information. > Note > > If a parameter is omitted, the value will not be changed. If a parameter is null or empty, the value will be deleted. > > The following parameters can't be null or empty: > - entityType > - status > - contactInformation > - customFieldValues

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payee.write

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payee in Tipalti.

get.description:
The Get list of payer entities action retrieves a list of payer entities according to specific search/filtering criteria. If a filter is not specified, the API response will include all payer entities.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payer-entity.read

schema.description: The filter query string. See Filtering for query specifications. Available filterable parameters are described below.
The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

get.description:
The Get payer entity action retrieves a specific payer entity's information by using its given ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payer-entity.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payer entity in Tipalti.

post.description:
The Create payment batch action joins together a list of payments into a single request.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payment-batch.write

schema.description: list of payments to be created in batch
list of payments to be created in batch
list of payments to be created in batch

get.summary: Get payment batch upload summary by ID
get.description:
The Get payment batch upload summary by ID action retrieves a payments batch's creation status and additional information by using its tracking batch ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payment-batch.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment batch in Tipalti.

get.summary: Get payment batch instructions by ID
get.description:
The Get payment batch instructions by ID action retrieves a payments batch's information by using its tracking batch ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payment-batch.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment batch in Tipalti.

schema.description: The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

get.description:
The Get list of payments action retrieves a list of payments according to pre-defined search/filtering criteria. If a filter is not specified, the API response will include all payments.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payment.read

schema.description: The filter query string. See Filtering for query specifications. Available filterable parameters are described below.
The number of results displayed per page. See Pagination - page size for details and limitations.
A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. See Pagination - page cursor for details and limitations.

get.description:
The Get payment by ID action retrieves a specific payment's information by using its given ID.

Required Scopes

tipalti.api.payment.read

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payment in Tipalti.

currency.description: The amount's currency, as per ISO 4217 standard.

code.description: Error identifier of the response. See APIError object for more information.

message.description: Informative error message explaining the nature of the error.

docUrl.description: Link to a general error page or a resource error page.

parameter.description: Indicates the name of the invalid parameter in the request.

traceId.description: A unique identifier of the API request in Tipalti's servers.
A unique identifier of the API request in Tipalti's servers.

status.description: Status of the batch. See batch statuses for more information.

timeCreated.description: Date and time the batch was created.

timeCompleted.description: Date and time the batch processing was completed. If the process is not yet completed, this field will be empty.

failedItemsCount.description: Number of items that failed processing.

batchItemId.description: Item ID provided by the payer when creating the batch.

id.description: ID for each item within the batch generated by Tipalti upon batch creation.

status.description: Processing status of an item within the batch.

errors.description: List of errors when an item status is FAILED.

totalCount.description: Total number of items in the request.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

items.description: List of items in the batch.

batchErrors.description: List of errors when the batch status is FAILED.

customFieldId.description: The unique identifier of the custom field.

valuesIds.description: The IDs of the values in the value option list (for custom field of type LIST).

value.description: The value of the custom field (for custom field of type TEXT).

customFieldId.description: The unique identifier of the custom field.

valueType.description: The type of the custom field.

valuesIds.description: The IDs of the values in the value option list (for custom field of type LIST).

value.description: The value of the custom field (for custom field of type TEXT).

id.description: The unique identifier of the GL account in Tipalti.

externalId.description: The unique identifier of the GL account in the ERP.

description.description: A short description of the GL account.

currency.description: The GL account's selected payment currency, as per ISO 4217 standard.

isClosed.description:
Indicates if the GL account is closed.
Closed accounts are not deleted from the system and can be displayed in certain searches. These accounts are uneditable.

report1099Type.description: The type of income for 1099 filling purposes, according to the box numbers of the Federal tax authorities.

erpAccountType.description: The GL account's type received from the ERP.

payerEntityIds.description:
The payer entities assigned to the GL account.
If the array is empty, it indicates that the GL account is relevant to all payer entities.

totalCount.description: The total number of GL accounts that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

description.description: A description of the expense in the line.

quantity.description: The quantity of the good or service purchased.

unitPrice.description: The price of a single unit of the good or service purchased.

netAmount.description: The net amount of the invoice line. If quantity and unitPrice are also provided for this line, net amount must equal quantity multiplied by unitPrice.

taxAmount.description: The tax amount of the invoice line. If provided, taxAmount must equal the line's netAmount multiplied by the tax rate of the taxCodeId.

taxCodeId.description: The unique identifier of the tax code in Tipalti. If either taxAmount or Tax code has a value, the other field must also have a value.

customFieldValues.description: The custom fields that will be included in each of the invoice lines.

id.description: The unique identifier of the invoice line in Tipalti.

description.description: A description of the expense in the line.

quantity.description: The quantity of the good or service purchased.

unitPrice.description: The price of a single unit of the good or service purchased.

netAmount.description: The net amount of the invoice line. If quantity and unitPrice are also provided for this line, net amount must equal quantity multiplied by unitPrice.

taxAmount.description: The tax amount of the invoice line. If provided, taxAmount must equal the line's netAmount multiplied by the tax rate of the taxCodeId.

totalAmount.description: The total amount (net + tax) of the invoice line.

taxCodeId.description: The unique identifier of the tax code in Tipalti. If either taxAmount or Tax code has a value, the other field must also have a value.

customFieldValues.description: The custom fields that will be included in each of the invoice lines.

totalCount.description: The total number of invoice lines that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

id.description: The unique identifier of the invoice in Tipalti.

invoiceNumber.description: The invoice number. Usually unique per payee, unless it's a duplicate invoice.

subject.description: The invoice subject. A short description displayed at the top of the generated invoice.

invoiceDate.description: The date the invoice was issued by the payer's system in UTC time, as per ISO-8601 standard.

dueDate.description: The invoice's due date in UTC time, as per ISO-8601 standard.

netAmount.description: The total net amount as presented on the invoice. The currency must be the same in all invoice amounts.

taxAmount.description: The total tax amount as presented on the invoice. The currency must be the same in all invoice amounts.

totalAmount.description: The total invoice amount. Equal to the sum of net and tax amounts. The currency must be the same in all invoice amounts.

payeeId.description: The unique identifier of the payee in Tipalti.

creationDate.description: The invoice's creation date, automatically generated by Tipalti in UTC time, as per ISO-8601 standard.

description.description: The invoice description. Can be used for internal notes.

refCode.description: The invoice's unique reference code generated by Tipalti.

payerEntityId.description: The unique identifier of the subsidiary associated with the invoice.

apAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the AP account (a GL account of type "AP account") associated with the invoice.

incomeType.description: The invoice income type. Required for tax purposes when using Tipalti's tax withholding (US only).

customFieldValues.description: The custom fields used on the invoice. To learn which custom fields are mandatory on your invoices go to Tipalti Hub, Administration -> Bill settings -> Bill field settings.

lines.description: The invoice lines. Invoices may have up to 100 lines.

totalCount.description: The total number of invoices that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

batchItemId.description: The unique identifier of a specific invoice in the batch. Used to identify the invoice's creation result in the response.

refCode.description:
The Invoice's unique reference code provided by the payer.
In some flows, the reference code may be generated by Tipalti.

invoiceNumber.description: The invoice number. Usually unique per payee, unless it's a duplicate invoice.

subject.description: The invoice subject. A short description displayed at the top of the generated invoice.

invoiceDate.description: The date the invoice was issued by the payer's system in UTC time, as per ISO-8601 standard.

dueDate.description: The invoice's due date in UTC time, as per ISO-8601 standard.

currency.description: The invoice amount's currency, as per ISO 4217 standard. Only Currencies that Tipalti supports.

payeeId.description: The unique identifier of the payee in Tipalti.

description.description: The invoice description. Can be used for internal notes.

payerEntityId.description: The unique identifier of the subsidiary associated with the invoice.

apAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the AP account (a GL account of type "AP account") associated with the invoice.

incomeType.description: The invoice income type. Required for tax purposes when using Tipalti's tax withholding (US only).

customFieldValues.description: The custom fields used on the invoice. To learn which custom fields are mandatory on your invoices go to Tipalti Hub, Administration -> Bill settings -> Bill field settings.

lines.description: The lines that will appear on the bill. At least a single line is required. The request is limited to 100 lines per invoice.

items.description: List of items to be included in the batch.
List of items to be included in the batch.

hasNextPage.description: Indicates whether there is another page or not.

nextPageCursor.description: Page cursor to use on the next API request call to retrieve next items.

PageApiInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

id.description: The unique identifier of the tax code in Tipalti.

externalId.description: The unique identifier of the tax code in the ERP.

isActive.description: Indicates if the tax code is active. Inactive tax codes are not deleted from the system and can be displayed in certain searches.

payerEntityIds.description: The payer entities assigned to the tax code. If the array is empty, it indicates the tax code is relevant to all payer entities.

totalCount.description: The total number of tax codes that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

eCustomFieldValueType.description: The custom field's value type. For more information see Custom fields.

code.description: The alert code. See Payment error codes for more information.

message.description: A short description of the alert.

type.description:
The type of payment alert.
  • ERROR - There is an issue with the payment that prevents it from being processed.
  • WARNING - There is an issue with the payment, but it will still be processed.

docUrl.description: URL referencing the documentation of the specified alert.

traceId.description: A unique identifier of the API request in Tipalti's servers.

firstName.description:
The payee's first name.
If the `entityType` is **INDIVIDUAL**, this field is required.

lastName.description:
The payee's last name.
If the `entityType` is **INDIVIDUAL**, this field is required.

companyName.description:
The payee's company name.
If the `entityType` is **COMPANY**, this field is required.

alias.description: An alternate name for the payee, if applicable.

address2.description: The payee's additional address information (apartment, entrance, suite, etc.).

stateProvinceCode.description: The payee's state/ province code as per ISO 3166-2 standard.

beneficiaryCountryCode.description: The payee's country code as per ISO 3166-2 standard.

paymentCountryCode.description: The code of the country where the payee chooses to receive the payment as per ISO 3166-2 standard.

phone.description:
The payee's phone number without the country dialing code.
Country code must be added in the `phoneCountryCode` field and match the specified country's phone number format.

phoneCountryCode.description: This is required when the phone number is provided. The payee's phone number country code as per ISO 3166-2 standard.

countryOfBirthCode.description: The payee's country of birth code as per ISO 3166-2 standard.

dateOfBirth.description: The payee's date of birth as per ISO 8601 format standard.

languageCode.description: The payee's preferred language for communications as per ISO 639-1, ISO 639-2, and IETF language tag standards. Language support varies from channel to channel. If an unsupported language is selected, English will be used. For the full list of supported languages, refer to Supported Languages.

paymentInstructions.description: An array of objects representing payment instructions.

CreateBatchPaymentsRequest.description: list of payments to be created in batch

id.description:
The unique identifier of the payment batch in Tipalti.
This ID is used in the Get payment batch summary to track the batch.

CreateBatchPaymentsResponse.description: PublicAPI response for payments list creation request

id.description: The unique identifier of the custom field in Tipalti.

externalId.description: The unique identifier of the custom field as generated outside of Tipalti.

name.description: The name of the custom field as displayed in Tipalti.

description.description: The description of the custom field.

resources.description: The resources that the custom field belongs to. For more information see Custom fields.

valueType.description: The custom field's value type. For more information see Custom fields.

isActive.description: Indicates if the custom field is active. For more information see Custom fields.

attributes.description: Attributes that are relevant for a specific domain. For more information see Custom fields.

totalCount.description: The total number of custom fields that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

customFieldId.description: The unique identifier of the custom field.

value.description: The value of the custom field (for custom field type TEXT).

customFieldId.description: The unique identifier of the custom field.

value.description: The value of the custom field (for custom field of type TEXT).

id.description: The unique identifier of the custom field value option in Tipalti.

externalId.description: The unique identifier of the custom field value option as generated outside of Tipalti.

isActive.description: Indicates if the custom field value option is active.

payerEntityIds.description:
The IDs of the payer entities to which the custom field value option belongs.
If the array is empty, it indicates that the value option is relevant to all payer entities.

value.description: The value of the custom field value option.

totalCount.description: The total number of custom field value options that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

items.description: A list of custom field value options.

type.description:
The exchange rate's type.
  • SUBMITTED_CURRENCY_TO_PAYEE_CURRENCY - The rate for converting the payment currency to the currency requested by the payee.
  • SUBMITTED_CURRENCY_TO_PAYER_ACCOUNT_CURRENCY - The rate for converting the payment currency to the currency defined in the payer account.
  • INTERNAL_VALUE - Represents several possible internal values. For more information, contact Tipalti support.

The type of fee applied to the payment.
  • FX - The fee applied for a currency conversion.
  • TRANSACTION - The transaction fee.
  • PROVIDER - The payment provider's processing fee.
  • LIFTING - The transaction fee applied to the recipient by the recipient's bank or an intermediary bank, when cash is transferred through a wire transfer.
  • NET_NOW - The fee charged for a net now transaction.
  • INTERNAL_VALUE - Represents several possible internal values. For more information, contact Tipalti support.

entityType.description: The type of entity being charged with the related fee.

provider.description: The name of the provider for this account, e.g., Wells Fargo, Paypal, or Tipalti for virtual accounts.

totalAmount.description: The total amount of payments submitted in the batch.

immediateAmount.description: The amount of all unscheduled payments.

payerFees.description:
The fee paid to Tipalti by the payer.
This fee is applied on unscheduled payments only.

scheduledAmount.description: The amount for the scheduled payments in the payment instructions that don't have errors.

withholding.description: The amount withheld from the payment (in the payment currency).

additionalWithholding.description: The additional amount withheld from the payment as defined by the payer (in the payment currency).

estimatedProviderFees.description: Additional fees that may be required by the provider for non-scheduled payments.

fundsRequired.description: The amount of funds required for the payment of the current batch.

outstandingPaymentsAmount.description: Total amount of payments previously submitted for payment and not yet paid.

paymentAmount.description: The total payable amount in payment instructions minus any withholding and additional withholding.

refCode.description: The payee's unique reference code provided by the payer.

preferredPayerEntityId.description: The unique identifier of the payer entity assigned to the payee.

customFieldValues.description:
Represents the input model for custom field resource values.
Values can be selected from a closed values list using their IDs or provided as free text.
Either the ValuesIds or Value property must have a value.

id.description: The unique identifier of the payee in Tipalti.

refCode.description:
The payee's unique reference code provided by the payer.
Across Tipalti system, refCode may be also referred to as IDAP or Payee ID.

preferredPayerEntityId.description:
The unique identifier of the payer entity assigned to the payee.
This ID is provided by the payer.

statusChangeDateTimeUTC.description: The timestamp of the payee's latest status change in UTC time zone, as per ISO 8601 standard.

statusReason.description:
The reason for the payee's latest status change.
Reasons can be set manually by the payer or automatically by the system.

isAccountClosed.description:
Indicates whether this payee account is closed.
Closed accounts are not deleted from the system and can be displayed in certain searches. These accounts are uneditable.

isPayable.description: Indicates whether the payee is currently payable. For more information see Unpayable reasons.

lastChangeDateTimeUTC.description: The timestamp of the payee's latest change in UTC time zone, as per ISO 8601 standard.

totalCount.description: The total number of payees that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

statusReason.description: The reason for the payee's latest status change. Reasons can be set manually by the payer or automatically by the system.

isAccountClosed.description: Indicates whether this payee account is closed. Closed accounts are not deleted from the system and can be displayed in certain searches. These accounts are uneditable.

customFieldValues.description:
The input model for custom field resource values.
Values can be selected from a closed values list using their IDs or provided as free text.
To update a customFieldValue, provide the new value or valuesIds, not both.
To delete a customFieldValue,  send only the customFieldId (omit value/valueIds).

id.description: The unique identifier of the payer entity in Tipalti.

entityName.description: The name of the payer entity.

legalName.description: The legal name of the payer entity, as officially registered.

isDefault.description: Indicates whether the payer entity is the default entity of the payer.

brandName.description: The name of the payer entity displayed to the payee.

externalId.description: The ID of the payer entity in the payer's ERP.

incomeTypes.description: The income types associated with the payer entity. Only applicable to payer entities collecting W8 tax forms. If null, indicates that the payer entity has no income type associated with it.

totalCount.description: The total number of payer entities that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

id.description: The unique identifier of the payment in Tipalti.

refCode.description: The reference code of the payment sent by the payer.

payeeId.description: The unique identifier of the payee receiving the payment

scheduledDate.description: The date and time the payment is scheduled to be made, as per ISO 8601 format standard.

instructionStatus.description: Status of the uploaded instruction. See Payment batch's instruction status for more information.

totalCount.description: The total number of payment instructions that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

payeeId.description: The unique identifier of the payee receiving the payment.

refCode.description: The payment's unique reference code provided by the payer.

scheduledDate.description: The date and time the payment is scheduled to be made, as per ISO 8601 format standard including a trailing Z offset. If NULL is retrieved, the payment is due immediately.

isVisibleToPayeeWhenScheduled.description: Indicates whether the payee can view the scheduled payment's information in the iFrame or Tipalti Hub.

isThresholdIgnored.description: In a case where the payment exceeds or doesn't meet the threshold, indicates whether the system ignores the payment threshold and executes the payment.

isMaxWithholdingApplied.description: In a case where the payee is unpayable due to an incomplete tax form, indicates whether the system will process a payment with the max withholding applicable to the relevant tax form.

isTaxValidationIgnored.description: If TIN (Tax identification number) validation is enabled and this field is set to TRUE, the result of the TIN validation is ignored.

eWalletMessage.description: The payment's e-wallet message attached to the payment by the payer.

bankingMessage.description: The payment's banking message attached to the payment by the payer.

emailMessage.description: If provided, it overrides the email subject line defined in the "Payment - Paid" email template, otherwise, the eWalletMessage is used.

incomeType.description:
The income type per payment.
This is required when there are multiple income types per payment.

additionalWithholding.description:
The additional percentage to be withheld from payments.
Use only if an additional withholding module, such as State Withholding is supported.

usSource.description: Relevant for Royalties income type, indicates the percentage of the payment that is U.S.-sourced and upon which withholding application will apply.

payingEntityId.description:
The unique identifier of the payer entity who's sending the payment.
**Note:** for payer entities with tax flows, the paying entity is the default payer entity, and it can't be changed.

paymentMethodType.description: The payee's selected payment method. See Payment methods for more information.

currency.description: The payee's selected payment currency, as per ISO 4217 standard.

id.description: The unique identifier of the payment in Tipalti.

batchId.description: The payment batch's unique identifier generated by Tipalti.

payeeId.description: The unique identifier of the payee receiving the payment.

payerEntityId.description: The unique identifier of the payer entity sending the payment.

refCode.description: The payment's unique reference code provided by the payer.

providerTransactionRefCode.description: The reference code of the payment as defined by the provider.

eWalletMessage.description: The payment's e-wallet message attached to the payment by the payer.

bankingMessage.description: The payment's banking massage attached to the payment by the payer.

emailSubject.description: The email subject of the message attached to the payment by the payer.

submissionDate.description: The date and time the payment was submitted to Tipalti, as per ISO 8601 standard.

scheduledDate.description: The date and time the payment is scheduled to be made, as per ISO 8601 standard.

valueDate.description: The provider's estimated date and time that the payment will reach the payee, as per ISO 8601 standard.

transactionCompletionDate.description: The date and time the payment is finalized according to the provider, as per ISO 8601 standard including a trailing Z offset.

paymentMethod.description: The payee's selected payment method. See Payment methods for more information.

status.description: The payment's current status. See Payment's status for more information.

payeePaidAmount.description: The amount paid to the payee in the payment currency.

payerWithdrawAmount.description: The total amount deducted, by Tipalti, from the payer account.

payeeReceivedAmountInPayerAccountCurrenc.description:
The amount (in the payer's account currency) paid to the payee.
This amount includes foreign exchange fees if applicable.

fees.description: An array of all the payment's fee information.

exchangeRates.description: An array of all the payment's exchange rate information.

totalCount.description: The total number of payments that matched the query.

pageInfo.description: The pagination details. It indicates whether there is a next page and the page cursor location. See Pagination for more information.

id.description: The unique identifier of the payment batch in Tipalti.

status.description: Indicates the upload status of the batch. For more information see Payment batch upload status.

name.description: The name of the batch displayed for the payer.

submissionDateTime.description: The date and time the batch was submitted to Tipalti, as per ISO 8601 format standard.

isValidForSubmission.description: Indicates whether the batch can be submitted to Tipalti systems.

fundsProvidersSummary.description: A summary of the payments per payer's funding account.

exchangeRateCautionBufferPercentage.description: A percentage added on top of the exchange rate when the actual exchange rate used by the bank is higher than the actual rate charged.

paymentsBatchErrors.description: The error message displayed to the payer when the payment batch upload status is **FAILURE**.

PaymentsBatchSummaryModel.description: PublicAPI response for getting batch payments summary

region.description:
Indicates the tax jurisdiction.
For EU/ UK region, tax info is currently not available.

withholdingAmount.description: The amount withheld from the payment (in the payment currency).

taxWithholdingRate.description:
The withholding rate percentage.
Format example: 0.578 (means 57.8%).

treatyCountryCode.description: The treaty country code entered on the payee tax form, as per ISO 3166-2 standard.

incomeTypes.description: The income short name associated with the income type.

eEntityType.description: The type of entity being charged with the related fee.

eExchangeRateType.description:
The exchange rate's type.
  • SUBMITTED_CURRENCY_TO_PAYEE_CURRENCY - The rate for converting the payment currency to the currency requested by the payee.
  • SUBMITTED_CURRENCY_TO_PAYER_ACCOUNT_CURRENCY - The rate for converting the payment currency to the currency defined in the payer account.
  • INTERNAL_VALUE - Represents several possible internal values. For more information, contact Tipalti support.

eFeeType.description:
The type of fee applied to the payment.
  • FX - The fee applied for a currency conversion.
  • TRANSACTION - The transaction fee.
  • PROVIDER - The payment provider's processing fee.
  • LIFTING - The transaction fee applied to the recipient by the recipient's bank or an intermediary bank, when cash is transferred through a wire transfer.
  • NET_NOW - The fee charged for a net now transaction.
  • INTERNAL_VALUE - Represents several possible internal values. For more information, contact Tipalti support.

eInputPayeeEntityType.description: The type of payee. See Entity types for more information.

eInstructionStatus.description: Status of the uploaded instruction. See Payment batch's instruction status for more information.

ePayeeEntityType.description: The type of payee. See Entity types for more information.

ePayeeStatus.description: The payee's current status. See Payee's status for more information.

ePaymentAlertType.description:
The type of payment alert.
  • ERROR - There is an issue with the payment that prevents it from being processed.
  • WARNING - There is an issue with the payment, but it will still be processed.

ePaymentMethod.description: The payee's selected payment method. See Payment methods for more information.

ePaymentMethodType.description: The payee's selected payment method. See Payment methods for more information.

ePaymentStatus.description: The payment's current status. See Payment's status for more information.

ePaymentUploadStatus.description: Indicates the upload status of the batch. For more information see Payment batch upload status.

eRegion.description:
Indicates the tax jurisdiction.
For EU/ UK region, tax info is currently not available.

eUpdatePayeeStatus.description: The payee's current status. See Payee's status for more information.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Bearer prefix will be added automatically
